document.title: Title of Paper Being Batch Uploaded
document.abstract: This is the abstract field; the abstract field may or may not be a required field for the series you are uploading to. Please check with bepress Consulting Services (dc-support@bepress.com) if you are not sure.
document.comments: This is the comments field. The comments field is used to display additional information about the paper that is not part of the abstract field. For example, a publisher required citation may be displayed in the comments field.

field.name: custom
field.value: This is a custom field. Please check with bepress Consulting Services (dc-support@bepress.com) if you have any custom fields included on your submit form to determine the correct field names and types to use.
